<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This dataset offers multi-temporal metrics that describe per-pixel frequencies of fires. It provides data on the mean frequency of ires 
</p>

<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Subdatasets</h3>
<details style='cursor:pointer;border: none;box-shadow: 3px 3px 4px #f8f8f8;'>
<summary style="font-size: 16px;">`recurrence` | Fire recurrence (Nr. burn years / Nr. years)</summary>
|content|description|
|-------|-----------|
|value_range|0...1|
</details>
<details style='cursor:pointer;border: none;box-shadow: 3px 3px 4px #f8f8f8;'>
<summary style="font-size: 16px;">`meanInterval` | Mean interval between burning years</summary>
|content|description|
|-------|-----------|
|value_range|0...n|
</details>
<details style='cursor:pointer;border: none;box-shadow: 3px 3px 4px #f8f8f8;'>
<summary style="font-size: 16px;">`minInterval` | Minium interval between burning years</summary>
|content|description|
|-------|-----------|
</details>
<details style='cursor:pointer;border: none;box-shadow: 3px 3px 4px #f8f8f8;'>
<summary style="font-size: 16px;">`maxInterval` | Maximum interval between burning years</summary>
|content|description|
|-------|-----------|
|value_range|0...n|
</details>
